summary: A romantic drama about a working-class woman and her experiences traveling back home.
cast: Suheir Hammad|Saleh Bakri|Riyad Ideis|Dana Drigov|Edna Blilious|Ishai Golan|Hagar Lotem|Renana Lotem|Sylvie Wetz|Yahya Barakat|Khaled Hourani|Ismael Dabbag|Jack Saadeh|Iman Aoun|Giras Abu Sabbah|Martin Daltry|Ihab Jadallah|Hisham Daraghmeh|Um Hussein Al Malhi|Oz Shelach|Walid Abdul Salam|Ashera Ramadan|Mazen Saade|Diana Buttu|Khader|Natalie Hamdan|Nathalie Soudah|Faras Awad|Rami Mussalem|Yonatan Zeevi|Maxim Sansour|Taher Kosa|Reem Makhoul|Shelly Goral|Avi Ammar|Jaber Abu Kaoud|Itay Alvin|Tamer Nafar|Juliano Mer-Khamis|Eilan Kinan|Shurouq As'ad|Avraham Shalom Levi|Franck Hammar|Ofir Harpaz
title: La sal de este mar
